Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory227.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Lost in thought, Rosetta suddenly receives a transmission from Babylonia. She takes a deep breath to suppress her doubts, then answers the transmission.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Looks like the comm link is stable. I'll make it quick.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'I need you to establish a link with the new CUB, the Combat Unit Booster, to collect field data.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Seeing Rosetta's hesitation, Asimov takes a sip of his coffee and explains further."}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I know you're busy with the reconstruction, but there's a reason why it has to be you who tests the CUB. You'll understand once you see it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Find a clearing, and I'll drop the CUB at your coordinates.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory227.png'}
{3: "Once the dust settles from the airdrop's landing, the security lock disengages after detecting Rosetta, revealing the CUB within."}
{3: 'The new CUB standing before Rosetta is an all-too-familiar sight and proof of her years as a Forest Guard.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'As you can see, the data for this CUB prototype is based on your centaur moduleâ€”the one they called "Lindwyrm". Thus, the CUB\'s combat strength is significantly upgraded.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Due to Babylonia's technical bias, you've been operating in humanoid mode since the Battle of Kowloong, while your centaur module has been stuck at maintenance for one reason or another.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "With recent advancements in CUB technology, we've finally managed to repair the centaur module you left behind so that it can return to the surface.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'But whatever the excuse, we did in fact use your old data without your permission and modified it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "That's fine. That was part of the deal for helping each other.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Restoring it to this state is more than satisfactory.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Thank you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "...Ehm, it's nothing.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The activated CUB lowers its head and stares at Rosetta.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "But I'm afraid I have one request.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'What is it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I thought I could never return to the battlefield as I used to.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'But this gives me hope. Could you please allow me to reintegrate with it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '...But the humanoid-hybrid structure will be a heavy burden for you. Are you sure?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'm sure.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'I see. All I need right now is just field data from the new CUB.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Once you're done collecting the data, I'll help you recalibrate with it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I'll begin preparations in the meantime.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Understood. I appreciate it.', 4: '1'}
